        public static boolean prerequisiteCheck(java.lang.String studentName,
                        java.lang.String uncheckedCourse)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Uses a StudentID and a Course to check if the student qualifies for the course.
        Parameters:
        studentID - the ID of the student to check
        uncheckedCourse - the intended course he/she is taking.
        Returns:
        true when prerequisites are met, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • checkClashWithAllTimetable

        public static boolean checkClashWithAllTimetable(java.lang.String studentID,
                                 java.lang.String courseID,
                                 java.lang.String section)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given the course and section ID of a bid, verify that the student's bid does not clash with his existing timetable
        Parameters:
        studentID - the student ID to verify
        courseID - the course code of the new bid
        section - the section code of the new bid
        Returns:
        true of the given course and section clashes with the present timetable
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
